@dguy @ijuma hmm I wonder if this is related to this change, seems Scala `2.10` dead locked again in the streams ITs ... maybe there is some unexpected side-effect here? Looking into that.

@dguy @ijuma hmm never mind the above, I can't reproduce locking in `RegexSourceIntegrationTest` locally and the `KafkaStreamsTest` is still fine (on the same machine that was easily able to reproduce the other deadlock).
=> different issue I guess

@simplesteph we never remove methods without a deprecation period. Do we have any evidence that people are misusing these constructors? If not, it seems hard to justify breaking existing users.

Added a couple more test cases and a check for aliases, aiming to make this a short term fix for [KAFKA-4837](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-4837) and address the more general concerns around plugin discovery in [KAFKA-5012](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-5012)
